title: Ticket #1772: Need global link visibility for qmgmt_all_users_trusted variable
description:
The boolean qmgmt_all_users_trusted declared inside src/condor_schedd.V6/qmgmt.cpp needs to have static keyword removed so that plug-in modules (SO) that will load into condor_schedd have visibility to the boolean.

This will be important for an imminent condor contrib that provides job submissions over Apache QMF.
remarks:
